What should I know about data protection when using the UTN website?
The website may transfer usage data to third parties like DAAD without EU-level data protection. You can manage cookie preferences under "Cookies" at the bottom of the page.

Hey, how can I save money as a student in Germany?
Always carry your student ID for discounts, and shop at budget supermarkets like Aldi or Lidl. Check online for weekly specials at stores near you.
